messages.message: Invalid transferFunction in basic DFD block. For a non-sRGB VkFormat with sRGB variants it must not be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
messages.details: DFD block #1 transferFunction is KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB but for VkFormat VK_FORMAT_PVRTC1_2BPP_UNORM_BLOCK_IMG it must not be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
